sourcesContent:
import { Tab as TwTab } from '@headlessui/react' import Card from '../cards/Card' import clsx from 'clsx' import TxButton from '../button/TxButton' import PledgeBtn from '../../modules/borrower/components/buttons/PledgeBtn' const Tab = ({ datas }) => { return ( {Object.keys(datas).map((data) => ( clsx( 'rounded-lg py-2.5 px-4 text-base font-bold leading-5 text-nav-menu', 'focus:outline-none', selected ? 'bg-white tab-pledge-selected' : 'hover:bg-white/[0.12]' ) } > {data} ))} {Object.values(datas).map((items, idx) => (
    {items.map((item, idx) => (
    Uniswap V3 LP Token Max LTV: {item.maxLtv} Liq. Thresh: {item.liquidationThreshold}
    ))}
))} ) } export default Tab
